title.narrative: Ningbo Municipal Solid Waste Minimization and Recycling Project

description.narrative: The project development objective (PDO) is to assist selected districts in Ningbo Municipality to increase the volume and proportion of municipal solid waste recycled with processes for waste separation at source and recycling.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
Ningbo Capital Kitchen Waste Treatment Co., Ltd.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Annual Audit | Description :furnish annual audit reports | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Annual work program | Description :Approval annual work program by Dec 15 each year starting 2013 | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Community awareness raising | Description :Ningbo Municipality conducts an effective and continuous publicinformation campaign aimed to raise public awareness of waste separation programs and encourage local residents to participate inwaste separation throughout the project period. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Financial Reporting | Description :furnish unaudited financial reports semi-annually | Frequency :SemiAnnual
Finance Agreement :Mid-term review | Description :preparation of a MTR report | Due Date :30-Sep-2016
Finance Agreement :Monitoring and Evaluation | Description :carrying out M&E and reporting | Frequency :SemiAnnual
Finance Agreement: Subsidary Loan Agreement duly signed between the Project Impementing Entity and NCKWTCL to fulfill disbursementcondition for payment under category (5)
